articles.title: Alternergy Gears Up For Philippine IPO To Bankroll Renewable Energy Projects - Forbes
articles.description: Alternergy—which built Southeast Asia’s first commercial wind farm in the northern Philippines—is gearing up for its initial public offering next month to bankroll renewable energy projects with a combined capacity of over 1.2 gigawatts.
